reviewText: For the price we paid I was expecting a high quality kit, but I was unimpressed by the materials offered. We are a family stationed in Germany and I ordered the German version - since we have been here for 4 out of the 7 years of our son's life and he has been from German Kinder to German Elementary, we wanted to practice with him so that we can continue speaking German to him. Both my husband and I were unimpressed.
